snippet: The Palestinian Authority’s announcement was aimed at ending protests in the West Bank, but a union leader rejected the concession and said street demonstrations would continue.
abstract: Palestinian Authority says that it has canceled recent tax increases in a reversal aimed at ending protests that have swept the West Bank.
lead_paragraph: The Palestinian Authority’s announcement was aimed at ending protests in the West Bank, but a union leader rejected the concession and said street demonstrations would continue.

headline.seo: Palestinian Tax Increases Canceled in Move to Calm Protests
headline.main: Palestinian Tax Increases Canceled in Move to Calm West Bank Protests
headline.print_headline: Palestinian Tax Increases Canceled in Move to Calm West Bank Protests
